sentences.english: Once the water reaches saturation , it can't take anymore.
sentences.chinese: 當達到飽和時，水將無法吸收更多的砂糖。

sentences.english: Please mix sugar and cream fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 請把砂糖和奶油對半參加。

sentences.english: Mix the sugar and jelly powder for the coconut pudding.
sentences.chinese: 把椰子布丁中的砂糖與果凍粉混合。

sentences.english: Heat up a wok with salad oil. Add in sugar and salt until fragrant and sugar has melted.
sentences.chinese: 油燒熱，放入砂糖炒出香味至冰糖融化。

sentences.english: Add in sweetened flour paste, rice wine, sugar and soya sauces Stir briefly.
sentences.chinese: 接着加入甜麪醬，加飯酒，砂糖以及醬油略煮。

sentences.english: Whisk it over medium heat until the sugar dissolves.
sentences.chinese: 中火攪拌，直到砂糖溶解。

sentences.english: Mix ground black sesame with sugar become the fillings.
sentences.chinese: 把即食黑芝麻碎加入砂糖攪拌，做成餡料。

sentences.english: In order to produce solely white sugar, technology of treating C-sugar remelt by floatation clarification was practiced.
sentences.chinese: 爲了能全產白砂糖，應用了丙糖回溶上浮澄清工藝。

sentences.english: Beat margarine and sugar until fluffy.
sentences.chinese: 把植物牛油和砂糖打至松發。

sentences.english: Beat the butter and sugar in a mixing bowl until creamy and fluffy. Add the eggs and continue beating until combined.
sentences.chinese: 把牛油和砂糖用攪拌器打松發後，加入雞蛋攪打均勻。

sentences.english: Taste the mixture and sweeten with a little more sugar, if you wish.
sentences.chinese: 可以試一下味，如果希望口味更甜些可加一些砂糖。

sentences.english: A tea set made of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 這套茶具是以砂糖爲原料做成的。

sentences.english: When taking, take the place of with juiceTea, add touch saccharic flavor.
sentences.chinese: 服用時以汁代茶，並加少許砂糖調味。

sentences.english: In a traditional Hong Kong mooncake, the filling is made with a whole egg yolk, lotus seed paste and granulated sugar.
sentences.chinese: 傳統港式月餅餡一般是整個蛋黃，蓮蓉和白砂糖。

sentences.english: Mix the sieved flour, 50 grams of sugar, baking soda and salt in a bowl.
sentences.chinese: 麪粉過篩，加入50克砂糖，小蘇打和鹽，混合均勻。

definition: abbr. for 低筋麵粉|低筋面粉[di1 jin1 mian4 fen3]
